data.text: @ZohakAshraf Sir, a refund has been processed from our end to the primary mode of payment on the 16th of November, 2022. We request you to visit the link https://t.co/z6SCIRoLQn to keep track of your refund status. ~Yashica

@sdahagam Sir, we regret your experience and your feedback is important to us. We'll surely highlight this to our relevant team for an internal review and hope to serve you better in times to come. ~Yashica
@Lisio88 Hi, we request you to share your mobile number with us over DM so we can get a call arranged for you to assist you with your booking. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@DsnikeshKumar Mr Kumar, please allow us some time to get this checked and update you. Meanwhile, we also request you to DM us a copy of the PIR (property irregularity report) issued by the arrival airport team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@hopping_head Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused and would like to look into this. Could you confirm if the error was on the website or mobile application along with your PNR over DM for us to check? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SrinivasShukla Sir, we regret the wait. We're coordinating with the airport team and will share the feedback for review. Please hang in there. ~Shreya
@HeySisyphus Sir, please DM the PNR so we may check and assist. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Prachi_chdhry Ma'am, with immediate effect customers traveling to UAE who are holding passports with one name (Either Surname/Last name is missing) won’t be accepted by the UAE government on inbound and outbound flights. ~Shreya
@vikrantkirar Sir, we regret the experience. Let us check and get back. ~Shreya
@akratidubey Ms Dubey, please share your PNR with us over DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF so we can connect with our concerned team and assist you at the earliest. ~Yashica

data.text: @rajagrawal5 Certainly, Mr Agrawal. In addition to one piece of hand luggage, IndiGo allows its customers to carry a small personal article such as a laptop or lady's purse, weighing not more than 3 kilos. ~Yashica

data.text: @VipulBhasin4 Please visit https://t.co/ICsDDkerkf and enter your departure and arrival sectors to know about the international travel guidelines in detail. You may reach out to the concerned embassy/authorities for more clarity in this regard. ~Shreya

@lqt5 Sir, could you share the transaction details with us over DM, along with your contact number, email address and mode of payment so we can get this checked with our concerned team and advise accordingly? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@amitabha1957 Mr Majumdar, we would like to inform you that a plan B has already been availed on your PNR. Once plan B is taken, flight move is no longer permissible. We look forward to your understanding of the same. ~Yashica
@ashishphadtare We're glad to know that our staff has assisted you well. Thank you for the shoutout. #goindiGo~Shreya
@psbhose Mr Bhose, this is not the experience we wish to deliver to our customers. Could you DM us your PNR so we can look into this further? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@abledoc Sir, we have duly noted your concern and shall raise the same with the team for further review. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@Parthapuchu Mr Acharya, we do have free seats available during web check-in and customers can opt for the same by selecting the auto-assignment option. If a customer has a seat preference for a paid seat, then relevant charges are applicable. Looking forward to your understanding. ~Yashica
@jbose84 Sir, we believe that your concern has been addressed by our team. ~Prahlad
@kshitiz21_6 Mr Lohani, we assure you our team is doing its utmost to reunite you with your belongings at the earliest and request your understanding during this interim. ~Yashica

@sushant307 Mr Shekhar, we regret the inconvenience and your recent experience. Could you please DM us your PNR and available contact number so we can connect with you over a call? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@abdulqadir6 Hi, could you DM us your PNR so we may assist you at the earliest? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
#goIndiGo from Chennai. Book now https://t.co/vldZJ39i1V https://t.co/F8YMKsdtjr

@InVideogame Hello, we understand your concern sir. Please know we deep clean and  fumigate the aircraft before departure. Please share your PNR so we may share the feedback with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@IndiGo6E Sir, we request you to share your PNR via DM so we can check and advise. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @diehard2812 Mr Saxena, a refund has been processed from our end to the primary mode of payment on the 06th of October, 2022. You can visit https://t.co/z6SCIRoe0P link to keep track of your refund status on the given PNR. ~Yashica

@iDeepK1 Sir, we are humbled by your kind words and thank you from the bottom of our hearts for the beautiful appreciation. We'll surely share your compliments with our teammates. Looking forward to more such experiences in the future. ~Yashica

#GoIndiGo
@Mortal04907880 Mr Mathur, thank you for sharing this moment with us😊. We all love the pre-vacation excitement vibe Goa-bound flights usually have. We wish everyone great times ahead🌴🌊 #GoIndiGo
@AsheeshChaturv1 Sir, could you DM us your PNR so we can connect with our airport team at the earliest to assist you with this? ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@iwrite4myrasam Yes, they can carry it in cabin baggage. ~Ojasvi
@ShaikhAsfaquz We are disappointed  to hear this sir. We always ensure that we assist our staff in all the possible ways. We have noted your concern. hoping to serve your better in future. ~Diyashi

@the_galantria Mr Gupta, we understand your concern. Please know, gate change comes under the concerned airport authority. However, we'll have your feedback shared with the concerned team for review. ~Ojasvi
@ManishM98203355 Hi, please DM us in detail and we'll assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@paritoshtechni1 Sir, we regret the delay on the luggage belt and are sharing your feedback with the concerned team for further review right away. ~Ojasvi

@kushanmitra We understand that you didn't relish our 6E Bao but do request you to try out other items as we keep on adding more options to our snack menu. Hope for your understanding and wish you a great snacking time on your next flight with us. ~Snigdha 2/2
@kushanmitra Mr Mitra, while the majority of the items are served at cabin temperature, you'll be pleased to know that all of them are prepared with a warm heart. 1/2
@BiswasBrototi Ma'am, we understand your concern. We never intend to disrupt the plans of our customers. Further, we are sharing your feedback with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi
@mysticalmadeira Ma'am, we are concerned to know this. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can share this with the concerned team. ~Ojasvi
@kalsianuj Hi, please allow us some time to get this checked, and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@maheshi4i Mr Chavan, happy to know that our team was able to assist you, amidst difficult circumstances. While we truly hope your father gets well very soon, we are looking forward to welcoming you back onboard again. ~Ojasvi
@sudhirkhodwekar Sir, we are disappointed to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may check and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@gauravujay_raj Sir, this is not the service we intend to provide. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@NahushBodkhe Hi, we are concerned to see this. We request you to share your PNR via DM and we'll assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@SumitKu91686019 Mr Singh, we understand your concern, however, it is mandatory to report such incidents to the arrival staff at the airport for any further assistance. We request your understanding on the same.
@preetam3 Sir, this doesn't seem right to us. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@swarn786 Hi, we request you to allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@i_am_kfc Hi, we are concerned to see this. Please share your registered email ID along with the transaction details via DM and we'll get to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@pchat11 Mr Chaturvedi, we regret the inconvenience caused. We never intend to disrupt our customer's plans. As checked, the flight was delayed due to operational reasons. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@SstheBoss Sir, we regret the delay in response. We are raising it with the concerned team right away. ~Ojasvi
@ani_hy Sir, please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@yusufg We regert the trouble, Mr Goolamabbas. Could you please DM us the contact number? We'll get this sorted for you. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@evasiveleo Hi, you can carry coconut oil and nail clippers in your check-in baggage. ~Ojasvi
@mrinalkapur Hi, we request you to DM the concern in detail and we'll assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@VATS0503 Mr Vats, it's never our intention to disrupt our customer's plans. We request you to DM your PNR and we'll assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@atom8om Hello, you may avail the auto seat assignment option during web check-in to avoid paying the seat charges. Please know we have duly noted your feedback. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@baljeet0405 Sir, liquor of max. 5 liters is allowed in checked-in baggage properly packed and sealed so as to avoid breakage. ~Snigdha

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.

data.text: @maverik_nishant Sir, we regret the inconvenience. We have already shared your feedback with the concerned team. We ensure fumigation of the aircraft is done properly before passengers get on boards. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi
@bhalodianand We regret the inconvenience sir. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@NimeshS8 Hello, we are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you. ~Diyashi
@sandeepsebol Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

@neenapanda Hi, it's never our intention to disrupt our passengers' plans. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. We hope for your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@uttej4me Sir, 6E25 will operate from Dubai Terminal 1. We wish you a pleasant journey. ~Ojasvi

@MohdSaifQurais5 Sir, we understand your concern, however, customers are requested to report at the Boarding Gates, at least 25 mins prior to the flight departure time. Since you reported 8 mins prior, our team was unable to accept you on the flight. We look forward to your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@AnuragK1517 Mr Khanna, thank you for the warm words. We are glad to know our staff assisted you well. We'll surely pass on the Kudos to her and wish you a lovely day ahead. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@debasis27973803 Mr Sinha, what happened? Please share your experience in detail along with your PNR via DM for us to look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@m_AniMore Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please share your contact details via DM so we may assist you with this. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@TheNameIsAfsar Sir, we are surely informing the concerned team at the airport. Furthermore, we request you kindly inform your mother to reach out to our staff for any real-time assistance. They will assist her. ~Sheetal
@BhaskaranT3 Sir, we regret to hear you were uncomfortable. In such cases, you can always reach out to our crew and ask them to adjust the cabin temperature. ~Sheetal
@pri_m_tweet Thank you for the shout-out for today. We hope you have a pleasant time flying with IndiGo. ~Sheetal

urls.title: Conditions of Carriage, Passenger & Baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: For each flight booked on goIndiGo.in, there are general conditions of carriage applicable for carriage of passengers and baggage.

data.text: @NandaNainadurai Sir, please know that the CUTE charges are levied at select airports for the usage of Common User Terminal Equipment (CUTE) services. You may visit https://t.co/anjh8jaZMt to know more. Let us know if you need any assistance with the booking. ~Sheetal
@XiPingMe1 Hi, we truly understand the pain of missing the flight. We would like to closely look into this and make it up to you. Please help us with the PNR via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@The_Khwabida Ms Sharma, we truly understand your situation here and would like to reunite you with your baggage as soon as possible. Please drop your PNR on our DM so we may quickly check on this. Thanks! ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@imRohitTomar Mr Tomar, we'll help you out. Please DM us your concern. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@shaikhalam_alam Sir, did you try clearing the cache & cookies or any other alternate web browser? Please share your contact details via DM so we may connect with you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Viral_Jain1405 Mr Jain, we regret to know that you had to wait for so long. We are sharing this with the concerned team on priority to expedite the process. ~Sheetal
@Ratheesh_Kumar Sir, we would like to have a closer look into it. Please allow us some time and we'll resolve your issue at the earliest. ~Sheetal

@gdesigner31 Mr Arora, please try clearing cache & cookies from the web browser history or try an alternate web browser. Let us know via DM if the issue still persists. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@cooldudeinindia Mr Sharma, we regret to make you wait. Please be informed that we are sharing this with the concerned team for review and to expedite the process. ~Sheetal

@Rakeshreddy4206 Mr Reddy, we regret to note this and believe that our Customer Experience Team is already looking into your raised concern. Please allow us some time and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Navi

@slimjd So glad to know you & family had a pleasant time flying with IndiGo. We will surely pass on your words of thanks to the concerned person, please DM us the PNR. #goIndiGo ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Kamlesh_Vidisha We are happy to serve you as many refills as you would like.  We sincerely hope you’ll join us in this endeavour on your next IndiGo flight. ~Sheetal 2/2

@Kamlesh_Vidisha Mr Sain, at IndiGo, it’s our consistent endeavour to do whatever we can to help reduce waste (particularly plastic) in order to help the environment. Our use of sustainable water cups is one small step in this direction. 1/2
